TEXT VERSION OF PROSPECTUS

This prospectus provides an overview of studying at The Glasgow School of Art at undergraduate and postgraduate level. Further information on our courses can be found throughout this website.

A copy of this prospectus is also available in pdf format and accessible format should you need to rescale the text size.

If you require specific information on any aspect of studying at the GSA, or need a copy of this prospectus in an alternative format please contact us and we will be happy to help.
